amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate all funding for the Corporation for Public Broadcasting.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 28 in the Congressional Record of September 3, 1997, to eliminate the $300 million appropriation in the bill to fund the Corporation for Public Broadcasting.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 78 - 345 (Roll no. 390).
